casebody.data:
No. 10-864. Bill Harbert International Construction, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. United States. 563 U.S. 987, 131 S. Ct. 2443,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1208,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3787. May 16, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

*1209Same case below, 391 U.S. App. D.C. 165, 608 F.3d 871.
